verses.verse: To <S%H3605>every<s%> thing there is a <S%H2165>season,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2656>purpose<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven:<s%>

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to be <S%H3205>born,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H4191>die;<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6131>pluck<s%> up that which is <S%H5193>planted;<s%>
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7495>heal;<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6555>break<s%> down, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> up;
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1058>weep,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7832>laugh;<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7540>dance;<s%>

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7993>cast<s%> away <S%H68>stones,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3664>gather<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> together; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2263>embrace,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7368>refrain<s%> from <S%H2263>embracing;<s%>
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1245>get,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6>lose;<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7993>cast<s%> away;
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7167>rend,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8609>sew;<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> to keep <S%H2814>silence,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1696>speak;<s%>
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H157>love,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8130>hate;<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> has he that <S%H6213>works<s%> in that <S%H834>wherein<s%> he <S%H6001>labors?<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6045>travail,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> to be <S%H6031>exercised<s%> in it.

He has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> thing <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> in his <S%H6256>time:<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> he has <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H5769>world<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> so that <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> can <S%H4672>find<s%> out the <S%H4639>work<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>makes<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> to the <S%H5490>end.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in them, but for a man to <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor,<s%> it is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

I <S%H3045>know<s%> that, <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> it shall be for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> can be <S%H3254>put<s%> to it, <S%H369>nor<s%> any thing <S%H1639>taken<s%> from it: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> it, that men should <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

That which has <S%H1961>been<s%> is <S%H3528>now;<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> is to be has <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H1961>been;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1245>requires<s%> that which is <S%H7291>past.<s%>

And <S%H5750>moreover<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> that <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> was <S%H8033>there;<s%> and the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> that <S%H7562>iniquity<s%> was <S%H8033>there.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> for there is a <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2656>purpose<s%> and for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1700>estate<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> might <S%H1305>manifest<s%> them, and that they might <S%H7200>see<s%> that they <S%H1992>themselves<s%> are <S%H929>beasts.<s%>

For that which <S%H4745>befalls<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H4745>befalls<s%> <S%H929>beasts;<s%> even <S%H2088>one<s%> thing <S%H4745>befalls<s%> them: as the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H4194>dies,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H4194>dies<s%> the <S%H2088>other;<s%> yes, they have <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7307>breath;<s%> so that a <S%H120>man<s%> has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4195>preeminence<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> a <S%H929>beast:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> are of the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1121>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> that <S%H5927>goes<s%> <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H929>beast<s%> that <S%H3381>goes<s%> <S%H4295>downward<s%> to the <S%H776>earth?<s%>

Why I <S%H7200>perceive<s%> that there is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H2896>better,<s%> than that a <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his own <S%H4639>works;<s%> for that is his <S%H2506>portion:<s%> for <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be <S%H310>after<s%> him?
